description: This table contains information about the levels of the adjudication formula that were used to price this service, including how the amounts were divided between those services.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BENEFIT_LEVEL
columns.description: The level used in adjudication benefits calculation.

columns.name: LIMIT_VARIABLE_ID
columns.description: The limit variable used by the level in adjudication benefits calculation.

columns.name: LIMIT_VARIABLE_ID_BEN_VAR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit variable.

columns.name: BEN_LMT_VAR_SPEC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The limit type of the limit variable used by the level in adjudication benefits calculation.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


By Procedure Unit


By Dollar Amount


By Co-insurance


By Visit

columns.name: LIMIT_AMOUNT
columns.description: The limit amount at the level in adjudication benefits calculation.

columns.name: LIMIT_REMAINING
columns.description: The limit amount remaining at the level in adjudication benefits calculation.

columns.name: PAYMENT_VARIABLE_ID
columns.description: The payment variable used by the level in adjudication benefits calculation.

columns.name: PAYMENT_VARIABLE_ID_BEN_VAR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit variable.

columns.name: PAY_METHOD_EPP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The payment type for the payment variable used by the level in adjudication benefits calculation.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Percent of Price


Amount per Unit


Fixed Amount


Custom Calculation


No Patient Payment


Not Covered

columns.name: PAYMENT_AMOUNT
columns.description: The payment amount for the payment variable used by the level in adjudication benefits calculation.

columns.name: COVERED_AMOUNT
columns.description: The covered amount used by the level in adjudication benefits calculation.

columns.name: COVERED_QUANTITY
columns.description: The covered quantity used by the level in adjudication benefits calculation.
